description: A group of emergency call flows to use in an emergency.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created the resource.

createdByApp.description: The application that created the resource.

dateCreated.description: The date the resource was created. Date time is represented as an ISO-8601 string. For example: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss[.mmm]Z

dateModified.description: The date of the last modification to the resource. Date time is represented as an ISO-8601 string. For example: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss[.mmm]Z

id.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.

emergencyCallFlows.description: The emergency call flow(s) to use during an emergency.

items.description: An emergency flow associates a call flow to use in an emergency with the ivr(s) to route to it.

emergencyFlow.description: The call flow to execute in an emergency.

ivrs.description: The IVR(s) to route to the call flow during an emergency.

enabled.description: True if an emergency is occurring and the associated emergency call flow(s) should be used.  False otherwise.

id.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.

modifiedBy.description: The ID of the user that last modified the resource.

modifiedByApp.description: The application that last modified the resource.

state.description: Indicates if the resource is active, inactive, or deleted.

version.description: The current version of the resource.
